message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to sell it. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,250.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9,500. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer it to you for $10,750.
Thank you for considering my position, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,200.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,200. I'm willing to make another small concession and offer it to you for $10,800.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,500.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,900.
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am now prepared to offer $10,600 for the product.
